items.title: User Activity Sharing
items.description: Enable users to share their fitness activities and achievements with friends within the app.
acceptance_criteria: User can post completed workouts to a social feed
Friends can view, like, and comment on shared activities
Privacy settings allow users to control who sees their posts
non_functional: Feed updates should load within 2 seconds
Privacy settings must comply with GDPR

items.title: Friends and Followers System
items.description: Allow users to connect with others by adding friends or following profiles.
acceptance_criteria: User can search for other users by name or email
User can send and accept friend requests
User can follow another user without mutual confirmation
non_functional: Search results should return within 1 second
System should handle up to 10,000 friend connections per user

notes: Assumed that core fitness tracking functionality exists and the requirement focuses on social features. Privacy and performance considerations are included based on typical social app expectations.
